postInstallNotes: Spark with Hive is being installed!
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at http://docs.mesosphere.com/services/spark/#uninstall to clean up any persisted state.
name: spark-hive
description: Spark is a fast and general cluster computing system for Big Data.  Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/usage/managing-services/spark/
